allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: USAA Y-9C financial data scraper and dashboard

- Y-9C data scraper for downloading FR Y-9C regulatory filings
- SQLite database for storing quarterly financial data
- Gradio dashboard with summary stats, Y-o-Y comparisons, and timeseries charts
- Support for balance sheet and income statement analysis

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
